title: Web Scraping/Data Mining | Health & Fitness Trainers and Specialty Instructors
snippet:
We are looking for an experience web scraper who provides a quick turn around time with quality work. We are looking to scrape fitness directory sites to compile of lists of certified trainers. From these lists we will need the First Name, Last Name, Email, Address, Certification, Specialty, Phone Number, and Website (if applicable)

I.e., 

Joe Trainer
1111 Street Address
City, State Zipcode
Email
Phone Number
Certification - NCCPT Certified ** PLEASE NOTE SOME MAY HAVE MORE THAN 1 CERTIFICATION**
Specialty - Personal Training ** PLEASE NOTE SOME MAY HAVE MORE THAN 1 SPECIALTY**
Website
